title: General
stimulusHtml:
4 points maximum

Experiment design (1 point each)

  • Identify the independent variable and how it is manipulated.

  • Identify the dependent variable and how it is measured (e.g., “count number of species”; not “observe diversity”).

  • Discuss variables to be held constant (at least three; one can be “divide the field in half”).

  • Identify the control (e.g., no herbivores).

  • Verification and replication (e.g., large plot or many plots).

  • Hypothesis or testable prediction related to species diversity.
